level.heading: Issuance of certificate of authority.
level.text: If the Commissioner approves the application of an applicant to be a merchant bank, the Commissioner shall issue to the applicant a charter stating that the applicant is authorized to conduct business as a merchant bank under this chapter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 13-308
level.text: For Law 13-308, see notes following ยง 26-833.01.
